revised_title: On New Combinations of Phosphorus and Sulphur
tldr: The author investigates the chemical reactions between phosphorus and sulphur, discovering new compounds and providing evidence for the idea that bodies unite in definite proportions. The study includes the synthesis of hydrophosphorous acid and the analysis of its composition, as well as the decomposition of hydrophosphorous acid into phosphoric acid and a peculiar compound of phosphorus and hydrogen.
